sentence.Network_en: Thus spake the Lord Mackay of Ardbrecknish.
sentence.Network_cn: 阿德布雷克尼什的马凯爵士如是说。

sentence.Network_en: Onfortulley , Hanck doesn't spake Anglish, so I will translit.
sentence.Network_cn: 糟糕的是, 汉克不会说英语, 所以我来翻译.

sentence.Network_en: Then the disciples looked one on another, doubting of whom he spake.
sentence.Network_cn: 22门徒彼此对看, 猜不透所说的是谁.

PerfectNetExp.abs: and as they spake unto the people , the priests , and the captain of the temple , and the Sadducees , came upon them ,1使徒对百姓说话的时候，祭司们和守殿官，并撒都该人，忽然来了
then spake Solomon , The LORD said that he would dwell in the thick darkness .那本百科全书的修订版已出版了。
while he thus spake , there came a cloud , and overshadowed them : and they feared as they entered into the cloud .34说这话的时候，有一朵云彩来遮盖他们。他们进入云彩里就惧怕。
“看！”spake他向阿周“，他们的立场，你的亲属的Kurus：“和王子

list.abs: Howbeit no man spake openly of him for fear of the Jews ., 只是没有人明明地讲论他 , 因为怕犹太人.
Adam , whiles he spake not , had paradise at will ., 亚当 , 在他还未说话之时 , 是可以任意使用乐园的.

and they spake unto him , saying , If thou wilt be a servant unto this people andserveand answer and speak good words to them , then they will be thy servants for ever .老年人对他说、现在王若服事这民如仆人、用好话回答他们、他们就永远作王的仆人。
Pilate therefore , willing to release Jesus , spake again to them ., 彼拉多愿意释放耶稣 , 就又劝解他们.

entry.def: Spake is the very old-fashioned form of the past tense of speak.

example.ex: Thus spake the Lord Mackay of Ardbrecknish.
example.tran: 阿德布雷克尼什的马凯爵士如是说。

auth_sentence.content: He dreamed that God spake to him.
auth_sentence.res_content: He dreamed that God spake to him.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He dreamed that God spake to him.

auth_sentence.content: Thus spake the voiceover on the BBC's celebration of high-fives and harmonies, I'm in a Boy Band!, last week.
